system.description:
Investigation: keen observation, forensics, research, and detailed analysis.

>Examples: throw Investigation/INT 6+ to locate and extract fingerprints from a crime scene. Throw Investigation/EDU 10+ (or opposed by someone’s Admin/EDU) to uncover evidence of fraud or other irregularities in a business’ accounting practices. Throw Investigation/INT 10+ to find hidden levers, or to notice that a crime scene was disturbed before being discovered. Throw Investigation/INT 8+ to perform surveillance on a target.
system.shortdescr: This skill combines keen observation, forensics, research, and detailed analysis
